name: nativescript-download-progress
description: Download large files with progress events

scripts.postclone: npm i && node scripts/postclone.js && cd ../demo && npm i && cd ../src && npm run plugin.link
scripts.test.android: npm i && npm run node ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm i && npm run node ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.plugin.link: npm link && cd ../demo && npm link nativescript-download-progress && cd ../src
scripts.demo.ios: npm i && npm run node ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles
scripts.demo.android: npm i && npm run node ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run node ./node_modules/.bin/tsc && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-download-progress && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: cd ../demo && rimraf hooks node_modules platforms && cd ../src && rimraf node_modules && npm run plugin.link
